thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Manhattan - Financial District - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable and welcoming
thread.title_full: Comfortable and welcoming - Review of Holiday Inn Manhattan - Financial District, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: thom15
title: Comfortable and welcoming
text:
Great Hotel, good size room with fabulous views of Hudson River and a short walk to the 911 memorial. If you are looking for a quieter area other than Broadway this is the place. Still lot's to see and most of everything is within walking distance, even the ferry to Statue of Liberty. The staff are very accommodating and the Tavern connected to Hotel offers a great selection of food and drinks.
Room Tip: Ask for a room facing the Hudson River See more room tips
